�MadMoo�


   MadMoo and the female bot runs into the shuttle as the Cop enters the 
building.

   "Freeze Assasin!"  The Cop yells drawing his gun

   MadMoo takes his gun out.  He grabs the female bot and points the gun at 
her head. He turns around with the female in front of him, making it to 
where the cop couldn't shoot him.

   "Just put down the gun and I won't shoot her."  MadMoo says.

   "NO!!! Surrender."  The Cop says

   "Let me go!"  Screammed the Female Bot.

   "No, if I let you go, you will probally die."  MadMoo says

   "No I won't." The Female says.

   "Okay, have a nice life."  MadMoo whispers in her ear.

   MadMoo let her go as he dived into the shuttle.  The Cop fires at MadMoo 
but accidently shooting the female, killing her.

   "Told ya."  MadMoo says as he closes the shuttles door.

   MadMoo blast off without closing the airlock.  The Cop go sucked into 
outerspace.  Because of the extream heat of outer space, The Cop Melted.  
MadMoo set the controls to Earth and just letted it go.


(Next time MADMOO LANDS)


>From: "Proto [" <beastwars@...>

>
>�MadMoo�
>
>
>    When MadMoo landed on the ground, he took off in a quick run away fron
>the Macrosoft Building.
>
>    "Hehe, I got away with only killing my target, thats preaty good."
>MadMoo says.  "No extra kills."
>
>    MadMoo looked behind him and noticed a cop car coming up behing him.
>
>    "Slag, they are still after me."  MadMoo says.
>
>    MadMoo looks around the buiding around him.  He notice a Barber Shop, A
>Dal-Mart, Right-Aid, Ma-N-Pa Corner store, Strip joint, and a Interglatic
>Space-Flight Agencie.
>
>    "If I had the time I would go to the strip-joint, but since I don't I
>guess I will just catch my Flight."  The Cow says.
>
>    MadMoo runs into the Interglatic Space-Flight Agencie.  He runs to the
>counter.
>
>    "Excuse Me Sir, can I help you?"  The Female bot behind the counter
>asked.
>
>    "I don't know, Can You?"  MadMoo says.
>
>    "Matters if you have a problem."  The Female says
>
>    "Yeah, I don't have a date for Saturday."  MadMoo says.
>
>    "Well, I can help you there."  The Female says.
>
>    "No Need, I plan on being on a flight for Saturday."  MadMoo Says.
>
>    "So one Ticket and for where."  the female asks.
>
>    "Well for anywhere away from here, and make that two if you want to
>come."  MadMoo says
>
>    The Female Bot gives MadMoo two tickets.  She was obviously Easy.
>
>    "So, which spaceshuttle we taking?"  MadMoo asks
>
>    Mad Moo looks across the street and Notice the cops checking out the
>Dal-mart.
>
>    "Apollo 1313."  The Female says.
>
>    "Okay, lets go."  MadMoo says.
>
>    The two run to the shuttle.
>
>

> >
> >MadMoo
> >
> >
> >    "Come on, move to the left."  MadMoo wispers to himself.  He was 
>aiming
> >his Sniper rifle at the crowd of a maximals.  He was there to assinate 
>the
> >President of Macrosoft.  The Presidents Name was Bill Setag(Gates
> >Backwards).
> >
> >    Just Then Mr. Setag move to the left.  MadMoo looked through the 
>Scope
> >one last time and fired.  Setag Robotic Head Flew off as he fell to the
> >ground, his Spark Failing him.
> >
> >    The Crowd ran around wild with the resent assination.  MadMoo got up
> >from
> >his place in the catwalks and ran for the exit.  When he open the Exit
> >door,
> >he noticed about 5 Cop Cars just pulling up outside.
> >
> >    "That Son of a Rust Picket set me up."  MadMoo said to himself as he
> >ran
> >in he other direction.
> >
> >    He open an other door seeing police coming up a staircase.  The lead
> >police Officer told him not to move.  MadMoo took out a smoke Gernade and
> >threw it at the officers.
> >
> >    "Get Down, its a Gernade."  The lead police officer yelled as his
> >sqradon
> >ducked down covering their heads.
> >
> >    MadMoo closed the door.  He found a Metal Rod and slamed it in the 
>door
> >handle, making it impossile to open.
> >
> >    MadMoo looked around where he was and noticed he was in a storage 
>area.
> >He grabbed a rope, blanket, and a Computer Printer.  He tied the Rope
> >around
> >the Computer Printer.  With the blanket he folded it up and put it in one
> >of
> >his storage pit.
> >
> >    "Hmm, If I hold the Gernade for 2.3562 secounds then throw it the 
>hole
> >should be big enough."  MadMoo says as he takes out a gernade.  He pulls
> >the
> >pin.  Excatly 2.3562 seconds after he pulled the pin, he threw it at the
> >roof.  Right as the very tip of the gernade hit the roof, it went off.
> >There was a 11 foot hole(In Radius) in the metalic roof.
> >
> >    MadMoo took the Printer and threw it up at the hole.  It landed on 
>the
> >roof.  MadMoo then grabbed the rope and climb up it.  Somehow the printer
> >held and he made it to the roof.  He then ran to the edge and jumped.  He
> >quickly wiped out the blanket and used it as a Parachute.  He made it
> >Saftley on the ground.
> >
> >
